text: right Lake Quri-gol is a small fresh to brackish lake in the uplands of East Azarbaijan Province in north-western Iran. Together with the adjacent reed marshes it is an important breeding area for waterfowl. A 1.2 km² site was designated as a Ramsar Convention wetland protection site on 23 June 1975. ==References== ==External links== * "Gori Gol (Important Birds Areas of Iran, Islamic Republic of)" * "Lake Gori" at World Database on Protected Areas (WDPA) Category:Lakes of Iran Category:Ramsar sites in Iran Category:Landforms of East Azerbaijan Province
title: Gurigöl Lake
